scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.publish: virmator publish "npm run compile && npm run test:all"
scripts.start: npm run scripts && concurrently --colors -c auto --names demo,iframe,compilation "npm start --workspace @toniq-labs/toniq-nft-frame-demo" "npm start --workspace @toniq-labs/toniq-nft-frame" "nodemon --quiet --on-change-only --config configs/nodemon.json"
scripts.start:tests: npm run scripts && concurrently --kill-others --colors -c auto --names iframe,frontend,compilation "USE_BASE='true' npm start --workspace @toniq-labs/toniq-nft-frame" "npm start --workspace @toniq-labs/toniq-nft-frame-tests" "nodemon --quiet --on-change-only --config configs/nodemon.json"
scripts.test:all: npm run compile && concurrently --colors --kill-others-on-fail -c auto --names types,tests,spelling,format,deps "npm run test:types" "npm run test" "npm run test:spelling" "npm run test:format" "npm run test:deps"
